Package co.cask.tigon.logging

Interface Summary
LoggingContext Defines LoggingContext interface so that we have at least somewhat structured logging context data and know how to inject it on the logs writing end.
LoggingContext.SystemTag Defines the interface for the system tag associated with LoggingContext.
LogReader Represents classes that can read log.
LogWriter Represents classes that can write log.
 

Class Summary
AbstractLoggingContext Provides handy base abstract implementation of the logging context that can be used by subclasses to simplify their implementations.
FlowletLoggingContext Flowlet logging context.
LogAppender Continuuity log appender interface.
LogAppenderInitializer Creates and sets the logback log appender.
LogCollector Collector for logging system.
LogConfiguration Configuration for logging.
LogEvent Represents a logging event.
LogFileReader A LogReader reading from file.
LogFileWriter A LogWriter that writes to file.
LoggingContextAccessor Allows to store and access the logging context.
LogMessage Represents an event to be logged along with the context.
